Text:
The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved. 

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0015881/

The seeder seems to have disappeared; However, I found this same film 2.04GB, on the Pirate Bay listed with Eng/German Subs. if you search for Greed - it will show up about 6 places below where this V1 is found. Start the New Torrent and wait until the Folder forms; then drag this films data into it. Now change the AVI Name to just Greed, then do a re-check, you will go up to 96.8% and then strat it and continue getting the film - there are 11 seeders on it.
This has burned in German Subtitles...
